Class JwsBuilder

java.lang.Object
iu.crypt.JwsBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class JwsBuilder extends Object implements edu.iu.crypt.WebSignature.Builder<JwsBuilder>
Collects inputs for Jws encrypted messages.
